personalInfo.name: Willie Liu
personalInfo.bio: Building scalable pipelines and turning raw data into actionable insights. Specializing in ETL, Data Warehousing, and Cloud Architecture.

about.description: I am a passionate Data Engineer with a strong background in building data infrastructures. I love solving complex data problems and optimizing performance.

experience.description: Led the migration of on-premise data warehouse to AWS Redshift. Optimized ETL pipelines reducing processing time by 40%.
Developed and maintained data pipelines using Python and SQL. Collaborated with data scientists to deploy machine learning models.

education.degree: Master of Science in Data Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: A real-time dashboard for monitoring system metrics using Kafka, Spark Streaming, and React.

projects.title: Data Warehouse Migration
projects.description: Migrated 50TB of data from Oracle to Snowflake with zero downtime.

projects.title: ETL Pipeline Automation
projects.description: Automated daily ETL jobs using Airflow, reducing manual intervention by 95%.
